general: You... you smell like slightly burned toast.
You're not the brightest torch in the crypt.
I’d say something meaner, but I might cry ashes.
Your face could scare the undead. That’s... impressive?
You're the kind of person who trips over flat tombstones.

37935747193372672: You're just a pretty boy who wants attention!
You're nervous about people listening to you pee!
You spend all your money on sad orphans! At least, that's what Droo said...
421372387892920320: You worship a dragon! I don't know if that's bad but Al says it's bad!
You... used to not know how to read! I mean, you do now...
You're bad at not being friends with people!
You're no good at punching people anymore!
415917911366959122: Your Sea Monster seems like he might be creepy!
You aren't good at reading human interactions!
You... oh, you have scaly skin! Ew!
You don't talk to your family anymore! I mean, they sacrificed you... I think that's still an insult?
210171206492618752: You fight with people a lot!
You're a scruffy man! Not very approachable!
You... you have a sour attitude!
You stink! According to those around us!!
939196878766080021: You like setting things on fire! I do too... but I've heard that's not great!
You used to be lonely! Like me! That's... bad?
You... uh, you can't be an animal forever!
Your best friend is a seagull!
324278880829571073: You could be a lot more original, you know.
You're not even canon in this universe! Why am I insulting you? Selfish!
You... you could be nicer to your players!
You spend too much time prepping for these sessions!
You stink! I mean... you don't exist here, so I can't smell you. But I'd bet on it!
You made me so lonely! Meanie!
